tools.name: assess-system-infra
tools.description: This system evaluates the compliance and potential risks associated with web crawling activities. It is designed to assist developers, legal teams, and data professionals in ensuring that their crawlers operate within acceptable technical, legal, and ethical boundaries.

concurrentUsers.description: Concurrent active users at peak time

activeUsersDaily.description: Total number of active users per day

server_info_crawled.name: Intelligent Architecture Recommendation Engine
server_info_crawled.overview: Generate tailored system architecture recommendations based on your business parameters such as QPS, concurrent users, database type, and AI model size. Automatically receive optimal resource allocation, middleware combinations, deployment strategies, and exportable architecture diagrams. Simplify infrastructure planning and ensure scalable, reliable system design with minimal effort.

tools.name: assess-system-infra
tools.description: This system evaluates the compliance and potential risks associated with web crawling activities. It is designed to assist developers, legal teams, and data professionals in ensuring that their crawlers operate within acceptable technical, legal, and ethical boundaries.

concurrentUsers.description: Concurrent active users at peak time

activeUsersDaily.description: Total number of active users per day

host.description: The host to bind the server to. Default is localhost. Use 0.0.0.0 to bind to all interfaces

port.description: The port to listen on for SSE or MCP transport

registry_entry.description: Generate tailored system architecture recommendations based on your business parameters such as QPS, concurrent users, database type, and AI model size. Automatically receive optimal resource allocation, middleware combinations, deployment strategies, and exportable architecture diagrams. Simplify infrastructure planning and ensure scalable, reliable system design with minimal effort.
